dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: DIVINE WRATH IS MILITARY AGGRESSION / PEACE IS DISARMAMENT
FAITH IS CULTIVATION / CREATION IS A LIVING ORGANISM

kernfrasen: Wer nur in eine Richtung geht
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: REPENTANCE IS A CHANGE IN DIRECTION

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Gott... hatte einen Kriegsbogen, aus dem er Pfeile schoss... legt er diesen Kriegsbogen weg.

cognitieve_implicaties: Peace is the absence of active threat
theologische_implicaties: The covenant is a unilateral disarmament by the deity
ethische_implicaties: Humanity must mirror this disarmament towards the earth
onbedoelde_consequenties: God might be perceived as volatile or previously 'wrong'

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher re-activates the etymological root of 'Bogen' (bow) to transform a weather phenomenon back into a concrete military object.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon successfully links the military metaphor of the 'bow' with the ecological metaphor of the 'earth as a victim'. The bridge is the concept of 'Umkehr' (turning around/repentance).

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: Shifts from a personal, changing God to an impersonal, systemic 'god' of technology.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: The first God learns; the second 'god' (progress) is a rigid idol.

sterktes.beschrijving: Revitalizes the 'Rainbow' from a cliché into a symbol of active disarmament.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Gott... benutzt das Kriegsinstrument als Vertragssymbol.

risicos.beschrijving: Attributing human psychological changes (learning/regret) to God literally.
risicos.voorbeeld: Wird der westlich-fortschrittliche Gott... auch umlernen?
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as inconsistent or lacking omniscience.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High - creates a tension between the promise and reality.

verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: God as a relational partner who responds to history.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits a baptism or creation-care service.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the military-to-peace transition. It successfully moves from a 'Vertical/Judgment' orientation to a 'Horizontal/Covenantal' orientation. The use of the 'Kriegsbogen' is a masterclass in CMT-based preaching.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'new life' of the child mentioned at the start to the 'new life' of the covenant.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Just as a parent puts away their anger when seeing their child, God hangs up the bow.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The 'God of Progress' vs the 'Biblical God'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Clarify that the 'God of Progress' is a metaphor for human hubris (idolatry), not a second deity.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: God was ignorant or immoral before the flood.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Frame 'learning' as 'relational responsiveness' rather than 'correction of error'.

alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The Kingdom of God as a 'Green City' vs the 'Asphalt Jungle'.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A profound use of cognitive mapping that transforms a 'dead' Sunday school symbol into a powerful critique of modern ecological destruction.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just praising the 'beauty' of the rainbow, CMT reveals how the rainbow functions as a cognitive 'pivot' from war to peace.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'feeling/thinking' to show how the physical experience of a 'bow' (tension/release) structures the theology of grace.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: The insight that the 'Rainbow' is not just a sign, but a 'disarmed weapon' (Source Domain: Weaponry) changes the entire logic of the covenant.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses 'Text World Theory' effectively by juxtaposing the biblical flood with Hiroshima and modern offices.
